title: Leviathan

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, it is announced this role is in-play.
- A day number is announced at the beginning of the game. If it is that day and you are not dead, you win.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Have the Cult of the Clocktower win the game.
Icon URL: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1183302777733140501/1183313487724822548/Icon_leviathan.png?ex=6587e190&is=65756c90&hm=8654da6b00238222319a560ba42bd0d365cda0c0545d94ee5052e47a90723e40&

desc:
Post 4582
*"To the last, I grapple with thee. From Hell’s heart, I stab at thee. For hate’s sake, I spit my last breath at thee."*
